SELECT ii.car_mark carMark, ecb.car_brand_name title, eem.contact_mobile contactMobile, eem.ent_member_name entMemberName, eem.address, FROM_UNIXTIME(ii.arrive_time) arriveTime, ii.vin, IF(ii.is_invoice=1,'需要','不需要') invoice, ii.car_no carNo
FROM ibs_insurance ii LEFT JOIN es_car_brand ecb ON ii.car_brand_id=ecb.car_brand_id LEFT JOIN es_ent_member eem ON ii.repair_id=eem.member_id WHERE ii.id=#{id}
